org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom

Class StaticCollisionBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Shape
      • org.mini2Dx.core.geom.Rectangle
        • org.mini2Dx.core.engine.geom.StaticCollisionBox
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CollisionShape, Positionable, Sizeable, Updatable, Parallelogram

    public class StaticCollisionBox
extends Rectangle
implements CollisionShape
    A Rectangle implementation of CollisionShape that does not need to be updated/interpolated. More lightweight than using a CollisionBox for static collisions.
